allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Spotify recommendations app with OAuth PKCE

Full Next.js 14 app with Tailwind CSS that lets users log in via Spotify,
paste a track link, and get 20 recommended tracks with album art, artist
info, preview playback, and "Open in Spotify" links.

- OAuth Authorization Code with PKCE flow \(login/callback API routes\)
- Access tokens stored in secure HTTP-only cookies
- Server-side Spotify API calls via /api/recommendations
- Track ID parsing for URLs, URIs, and raw IDs \(with zod validation\)
- Responsive dark-themed UI with loading/error states

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add demo mode for testing without Spotify credentials

When DEMO_MODE=true is set in .env, the app bypasses real Spotify OAuth
and API calls, using mock data instead. All three API routes check for
demo mode and short-circuit with fake tokens and sample track data.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
